description: [Sardonic](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1085) has the ability to collect the computer name, CPU manufacturer name, and C:\ drive serial number from a compromised machine. [Sardonic](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1085) also has the ability to execute the `ver` and `systeminfo` commands.(Citation: Bitdefender Sardonic Aug 2021)

external_references.description: Budaca, E., et al. (2021, August 25). FIN8 Threat Actor Goes Agile with New Sardonic Backdoor. Retrieved August 9, 2023.
